Package persistence

Class RepositorioCategoriaTarefa

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioCategoriaTarefa
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RepositorioCategoriaTarefa
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about task categories.
See Also:
